items.sentence: Tom can speak French almost as well as Mary can.
Tom checked to make sure the gas was turned off.
Tom claims he can accurately predict the future.
Tom definitely knows that he shouldn\'t be here.
Tom dialed Mary\'s number and got a busy signal.
You had better hurry. The train leaves at three.
You have to go there whether you like it or not.
Tom didn\'t notice anything out of the ordinary.
Tom doesn\'t have enough money to buy a new car.
Tom doesn\'t know the first thing about bowling.
Everyone loved the cheesecake I baked yesterday.
Everything eventually gets easier with practice.
Has something happened that I should know about?
He translated the book from French into English.
Let\'s assume for the moment that I believe you.
Let\'s get out of here before the cops get here.
Let\'s hope that Tom can handle that by himself.
Let\'s hope there are no more acts of vandalism.
I still don\'t understand what you want from me.
Tom is often disrespectful towards his teachers.
